message: Human trafficking is happening here in West Virginia. A recent report by West Virginia Public Broadcasting looked at how the drug epidemic in West Virginia is leading to an increase in human trafficking, particularly of children and vulnerable young adults.

data.description: Sadly, it seems like every day we hear of a new report of children or young adults being abused by trusted coaches or trafficked online. Every child deserves to grow
data.title: Taking action against human trafficking to protect our kids
